name: mri_label2vol
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Converts a label or a set of labels into a volume.

inputs.description: Enter the name of the label file. For multiple labels, use multiple --label flags.
inputs.name: Label files

inputs.description: Surface annotation file. Use this to input annotations directly.
inputs.name: Annotation file

inputs.description: Template volume; the output will have the same size and geometry.
inputs.name: Template volume

inputs.description: tkregister-style registration matrix mapping LabelXYZ to VolXYZ.
inputs.name: Registration matrix

inputs.description: Use the identity matrix as the registration.
inputs.name: Identity registration flag

inputs.description: Threshold for voxel fill; a value between 0 and 1.
inputs.name: Fill threshold

inputs.description: Volume of each label point; default is 1mm³.
inputs.name: Label voxel volume

inputs.description: Project the label along the surface normal. Type can be abs or frac.
inputs.name: Projection settings

inputs.description: Hemisphere to use for --proj or --annot. Legal values are lh and rh.
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Output volume in which each voxel will have the number of the label to which it is assigned.
inputs.name: Output volume

inputs.description: Hit volume, a multi-frame volume with one frame per label showing the number of hits per voxel.
inputs.name: Hit volume

inputs.description: Map the label stats field into the volume.
inputs.name: Label stat volume

inputs.description: Only use label point where stat > thresh.
inputs.name: Statistical threshold

inputs.description: Add offset to the segmentation numbers.
inputs.name: Segmentation offset

inputs.description: Creates a segmentation volume of the surface defects.
inputs.name: Defects settings

inputs.description: Use native voxel-to-RAS transform instead of tkregister-style.
inputs.name: Native voxel-to-RAS flag

output-files.description: The output volume where each voxel has the label it's assigned to.
output-files.name: Output Volume

output-files.description: The hit volume file showing number of hits per voxel.
output-files.name: Hits Volume
